name: S22 Set
long_explanation: S22 Set is a widely used quantum chemistry benchmark set. This expanded entry includes details on its purpose, dataset structure, reference methods (often CCSD(T)/CBS), statistical metrics (MAE/RMSE/MAD), applicability to different classes of methods, and best practices for benchmarking new functionals or computational workflows.

faq.q: What is the purpose of this benchmark?

faq.a: Using statistical metrics against reference energies.
